#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int c=1,d=1,temp,sum,sum2,m=1000000007;
	int t,x,y,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>x>>y;
		sum=0;sum2=0;
		for(i=1;i<=y;i++)
		{	
			if(i==1||i==2)
			sum=1;
			else
			{			
				sum=(c%m+d%m)%m;
				c=d;
				d=sum;
			}
			if(i>=x)
			{
				sum2=sum2+sum;
			}
		}
		sum2=sum2%m;
		cout<<sum2<<endl;
		c=1;d=1;
		}
	return 0;
}
